summary.para: Specifies the mode of editor hiding used by the Conditional Editor State Module.
Specifies that layout items containing the hidden Property Editors are removed, and the Detail View's layout is rearranged.

Specifies that only the content of the layout item is hidden, without rearranging the Detail View's layout. This is the default mode. In XAF ASP.NET Web applications this mode functions like the mode.
Used to extend the Application Model with the ConditionalEditorState node.

member.name: P:DevExpress.ExpressApp.ConditionalEditorState.IModelApplicationConditionalEditorStates.ConditionalEditorState

summary.para: Provides access to the ConditionalEditorState node.

member.value: An object representing the ConditionalEditorState node.

summary.para: The Rules node provides access to the conditional editor state rules defined in the application.
A Rule node specifies a conditional editor state rule used to dynamically configure a UI.

member.value: An object representing an Editor State rule.
